1540890.name: Stock Car USA
1540890.description:
Screenshots, gameplay, modes and other elements of the game have not yet been finalized, and are subject to change.

Ladies and gentlemen, start your engines!



The ultimate homage to Arcade Racing is here! Stock Car USA hits Steam!

From the 90s to your computer!

Stock Car USA is a love letter to the glorious, colourful and thrilling arcade racer reminiscent
of the 90s. Whether you're someone new to the old-school arcade style of racing games, or a seasoned veteran thrilled to get behind the wheel once more, this is the game for you.
Every second, turn and drift counts as your racing against not only other racers, but time itself to achieve new records. You might even be able to reach victory lane!

Hone your skills on the track!

On top of the game itself, you will also have other modes and features to sharpen your racing skills! Stock Car USA gives you access to:

  • Steering wheel support, so you can truly relive the arcade racing phenomenon in all of its glory.
  • Day/Night system, whether its blue-blue skies or beautiful stars on a dark night, this keeps tracks looking fresh every run.
  • Weather system, for those who want a little more change of pace from the ordinary. Rain, snow or ice, there's a new level of precision and dedication needed to master these elements.
  • Championship mode, the old faithful mode that puts your driving skills to the test across multiple maps. Slingshot your way to victory lane!
  • Arcade mode, single races for those who need their quick fix in thrilling Stock Car racing.
  • Time Attack mode, for those who want to make their names known in the world, or who wish to better their times, and become the fastest Stock Car USA racer of all time.
  • Practice mode, the perfect mode for racers and newcomers to get familiar with the track before tackling on the grand championships.
1540890.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
